author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ERIN LIKELY TO STRENGTHEN AGAIN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS...
summary: ...ERIN LIKELY TO STRENGTHEN AGAIN DURING THE NEXT COUPLE OF DAYS... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR THE SOUTHEAST BAHAMAS... As of 2:00 PM AST Sun Aug 17 the center of Erin was located near 21.3, -68.0 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
